channel.title: My hugo experimantal site
channel.description: Recent content on My hugo experimantal site

item.title: asss
item.description: lkfjgsdhga alkgl;ksdfjgkl’sdg kljfgkljsdklfgjkdjfg lkjdfgkljsdfkgjdkjg Sugar scripts help you change the perceived syntax of the conf language. The base syntax of the language is very simple, so sugar scripts take something else and convert it into that. That way, the admin sees additional features (like allowing continuation lines), while the parser in the core gitolite engine does not change. If you want to write your own sugar scripts, please read the “your own sugar” section in dev-notes first then email me.

item.title: Markdown Cheat Sheet
item.description:
This note demonstrates some of what Markdown is capable of doing.

Note: Feel free to play with this page. Unlike regular notes, this doesn’t automatically save itself.

item.title: Using the gallery shortcode
item.description: This way you can easily include a gallery into your page. Copy the code below into your content file and enter the relative paths to your images.

item.title: Formulas with MathJax
item.description: Mathematical equations in form of LaTeX or MathML code can be rendered with the support of MathJax. MathML works out of the box. If you’re using LaTeX you need to wrap your equation with $$ as shown in the following example:

item.title: How to add pages to the menu
item.description: I’m a linked post in the menu. You can add other posts by adding the following line to the frontmatter: menu = "main"
